name: Thales AI
description: Thales is an AI-powered agent fine-tuned to access and analyze various data sources. Leveraging these insights, Thales generates data-driven content for social media platforms, functioning like a human Key Opinion Leader (KOL). Furthermore, Thales is one of the first AI agents capable of autonomously transacting on-chain, navigating DeFi ecosystems, and executing strategic operations. Built on open-source and decentralized technology, Thales embodies the principles of transparency and innovation.
